metadata.feature_description: Load activity stream content in pages with 'Get More' and 'Show All' options

steps.action: Navigate to the Community page with Activity Stream module
steps.expected: Initial page of posts should load with default page size of 20
steps.actual: Initial page loaded with 20 posts displayed as per default page size configuration

steps.action: Scroll to bottom of the Activity Stream
steps.expected: Get More button should be visible at the bottom
steps.actual: Get More button is visible at the bottom indicating more posts are available

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click Get More to load next page

steps.action: Click the Get More button at the bottom of the Activity Stream
steps.expected: Additional posts should be loaded and appended to the existing list
steps.actual: Additional 20 posts were loaded and appended. New posts include: Privacy Test posts, mention tests, emoji tests, profanity tests, wiki articles, badge notifications, etc.

steps.action: Scroll to bottom after loading more posts
steps.expected: Get More button should still be visible if more posts exist
steps.actual: Get More button is still visible indicating more posts are available to load

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct number of posts per page

steps.action: Count posts loaded on initial page load
steps.expected: 20 posts should be loaded (default page size as per View.ascx.cs:41)
steps.actual: 20 posts were loaded on initial page. Code review confirmed PageSize = 20 in View.ascx.cs

steps.action: Verify pagination respects configured page size
steps.expected: Each 'Get More' click should load up to page size number of posts
steps.actual: Each Get More click loaded approximately 20 more posts as expected

steps.action: Select 'Posts' filter from the Filter by activity dropdown
steps.expected: Only Posts type entries should be displayed
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully. Only text post entries are shown, excluding wiki articles, badges, privileges, etc.

steps.action: Scroll to bottom with filter applied
steps.expected: Get More button should still be visible for filtered results
steps.actual: Get More button is visible at the bottom. Pagination works correctly with filters applied.

steps.action: Select 'Questions' filter from the Filter by activity dropdown
steps.expected: Empty state should be displayed if no Questions exist
steps.actual: Empty state displayed correctly. No posts shown, only 'See New Updates' link visible.

steps.action: Verify pagination controls are hidden for empty results
steps.expected: Get More button should NOT be visible when there are no results
steps.actual: Get More button is correctly hidden. Only RSS feed icon visible at bottom. Empty state handled properly.

steps.action: Check for Show All button in community activity stream view
steps.expected: Show All button behavior should match code logic (only visible when viewing specific journal item)
steps.actual: Show All button is not visible in community stream view. Code review of dnn.activityStream.ListView.js:604 confirms isShowAllButtonVisible is only set to true when settings.journalId > 0 (viewing specific post). This is expected behavior.

observations: Code review confirms default page size is 20 (View.ascx.cs:41)
Show All button is only visible when viewing a specific journal item (journalId > 0), not in the community stream view. This is intentional per dnn.activityStream.ListView.js:604
Continuous scrolling can be enabled via settings.isContinuousScrollingEnabled which auto-loads more content on scroll
The Get More button (id='getMore') is bound to the getMoreItems() function which calls scroll('down')
Page size can be configured per module via drpDefaultPageSize dropdown in module settings (options: 5, 10, 15, 25, 50, 100)
Pagination maintains scroll position after loading more items
